basics.name: Richard J Bocchinfuso
basics.label: Engineering Leader
basics.summary: As a passionate and dedicated information technology professional, I have extensive experience in the enterprise class systems design, implementation and operations. I have a proven track record of building and sustaining great engineering cultures, innovating and delivering tangible business value. My communication skills, leadership abilities and consulting experience compliment my software and hardware engineering skills, allowing me to provide hands-on technical direction for my team and customers alike.

highlights: As the Digital Innocation, Practice Director, I am responsible for Expert Serivices contractual service engagements which focus on delivering ElegantOps, the public Cloud and DevOps, and out ServiceNow business.  My responsibilities include vision, evangelism, execution, and oversight. Everything we do focuses on programmatic service delivery through automation, metrics and continuous improvement.

volunteer.summary: Volunteer for HFH in Monmouth County
highlights: Rebuilt homes in Keansburg and Freehold, New Jersey that were destroyed by Hurricane Sandy in 2012.

Published a forty pager achedemic paper on my experience. The paper outlines the impact of Huricane Sandy; the projects I worked on; my experiences; influencers such as religion, govenment, social good and human behavior; home owner sweat equity in the context of the HFH program; an examination or equality, prejudice, proposition, dicrimination and morality; family; finding meaning in the work and the dichotomy between the homeowner and the volunteer; democracy; and civic engagement.

awards.title: MTI Presidents Club
awards.summary: Reward trip given to top sales achivers.  I was the first every engineer ever nominated and sent to presidents club.

awards.title: Fusionstorm Presidents Club
awards.summary: I declined all FusionStorm president club trips and individual recognition.  After a few years of quietly declining the reward, I was asked why, to which I provided an answer.  I was they provided the funding to recognize the work of the entire engineering team responsible for our success. This was the first and only time Fusionstorm allowed dollars designated for Presidents Club to be used in a different way.  Sales leadership does not love my appraoch thus they discontinued invites; the fact remains that the success of the team is the our success not my success.

awards.title: National TechXplore Merit Award for High Achievement
